flow-definition.description: This job processes an instance definition and its main sections: 'data', 'artifacts' and 'deployment'. Depending on the context and the instance definition it can setup and run a new instance or setup and restart an existing instance.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: instanceUuid
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The UUID of the instance definition to process.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: creation
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether this is the first time this instance is started.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: artifactsChanges
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether there has been artifacts changes and hence whether the artifacts section should be (re)processed.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: dataChanges
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether there has been data changes and hence whether the data section should be (re)processed.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: deploymentChanges
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether there has been deployment changes and hence whether the deployment section should be (re)processed.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: propertiesChanges
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether there has been properties changes and hence whether the properties section should be (re)processed.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: instanceActive
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tells whether the instance is supposed to be active or not.
